text: Arau smarana karaa, yetiya ami tomaka kaichilo ye, niscaya tomara raba manuhaka paraibestana karai ache. Ami yi drsya tomaka dekhuraa'icho se'ito arau kora'anata ullekhita abhisapta gachato'o kerala manuhara babe phitanasbaraupa nirdharana karaicho. Ami sihamtaka bhaya dekhuraa'om, kintu i sihamtara ghora abadhyatahe brd'dhi karae
